Meta.description: Don't stress about gift ideas! Create wish boards, share with friends, and make every occasion special. Noriuto - your ultimate wish board app.

Auth.registerDescription: Join NoriuTo and start creating your wish boards today!
Auth.errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
Auth.errorPasswordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
Auth.errorPasswordTooLong: Password must be no more than 50 characters long.
Auth.registerCompleteBody: Your account has been created successfully. Please verify your email to log in.
Auth.registerGenericErrorToast: ğŸ˜µ Oopsss! An error occurred during registration. Please try again later.

HomePage.title: One place for all your wishes
HomePage.description: Avoid the question â€œWhat do you want for your birthday?â€ â€” create your own wishlist and share it with friends so they know what you really want as a gift. Perfect for everything from newborn birthdays to books and home items.
HomePage.board1description: New running shoes for the season, resistance bands upgrade, and that sleek fitness watch I've been eyeing.
HomePage.board2description: Kayaking trip gear, hiking backpack, and tickets for the next cycling marathon.
HomePage.board3description: A new lens for my camera, sketchbook for ideas, and a pottery class I've been meaning to try.
HomePage.concreteWishDescription: Keep track of the exact items or experiences you'd love to receive
HomePage.wishBoardsDescription: Organise your wishes by theme and share them with family or friends.
HomePage.giftExchangeDescription: Create or join an event â€” a party, celebration, or special occasion â€” and link your wishes to it
HomePage.featuresTitle: Everything you need for your wishes
HomePage.featureOneTitle: On your phone and your computer
HomePage.featureOneDescription: Your wishlist should follow you everywhere. Whether you're browsing on your phone or researching on your computer, everything stays perfectly in sync.
HomePage.featureTwoTitle: Share it or keep it private
HomePage.featureTwoDescription: Some wishes are meant to be shared, others kept to yourself. Keep your lists private for personal ideas and surprises, or make them public when you're ready to share with friends and family.
HomePage.featureThreeDescription: No more copying and pasting links. When you find something you like online, just use your device's built-in Share option to send it straight to your wishlist.
HomePage.preFooterCTADescription: Dream big â€” save your wishes in one place, share them with family and friends, and let Noriuto help turn dreams into plans.
HomePage.examplesTitle: Here's what your wish boards could look like
